item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Styles
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Icons font

A few examples of using icons font.

[separator] [one_third]

Star list

  • [icon name=icon-star] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
  • [icon name=icon-star] Mauris feugiat elit ac risus
  • [icon name=icon-star] Proin imperdiet neque arcu
[/one_third] [one_third]

Exclamation list

  • [icon name=icon-exclamation-sign] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
  • [icon name=icon-exclamation-sign] Mauris feugiat elit ac risus
  • [icon name=icon-exclamation-sign] Proin imperdiet neque arcu
[/one_third] [one_third]

Check list

  • [icon name=icon-ok] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
  • [icon name=icon-ok] Mauris feugiat elit ac risus
  • [icon name=icon-ok] Proin imperdiet neque arcu
[/one_third] [space]

Headings

From h1 to h6

[separator] [one_third]

Heading 1

Integer et velit eu dolor ornare vene natis non scelerisque velit. Curabi tu r vitae tellus nibh, ac convallis nisi.[/one_third] [one_third]

Heading 2

Integer et velit eu dolor ornare vene natis non scelerisque velit. Curabi tu r vitae tellus nibh, ac convallis nisi.[/one_third] [one_third]

Heading 3

Integer et velit eu dolor ornare vene natis non scelerisque velit. Curabi tu r vitae tellus nibh, ac convallis nisi.[/one_third] [clear] [one_third]

Heading 4

Integer et velit eu dolor ornare vene natis non scelerisque velit. Curabi tu r vitae tellus nibh, ac convallis nisi.[/one_third] [one_third]
Heading 5
Integer et velit eu dolor ornare vene natis non scelerisque velit. Curabi tu r vitae tellus nibh, ac convallis nisi.[/one_third] [one_third]
Heading 6
Integer et velit eu dolor ornare vene natis non scelerisque velit. Curabi tu r vitae tellus nibh, ac convallis nisi.[/one_third] [space]

Tables

Show your tabular data with style

[separator] [one_half]

Vertical table

Heading Heading 2 Heading 3
row 1, cell 1 row 1, cell 2 row 1, cell 3
row 2, cell 1 row 2, cell 2 row 2, cell 1
row 3, cell 1 row 3, cell 2 row 3, cell 3
[/one_half] [one_half]

Horizontal table

Heading row 1, cell 1 row 1, cell 2 row 1, cell 3
Heading 2 row 2, cell 1 row 2, cell 2 row 2, cell 3
Heading 3 row 3, cell 1 row 3, cell 2 row 3, cell 3
[/one_half] [space]

Other stuff

Blockquotes, marks, buttons, images & tooltips

[separator] [one_half]

Blockquote

Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per Sorem ipsum dolor sit amet conubia nostra, per nec lacinia augue commodo!
[/one_half] [one_half]

Mark

Integer et ornare quisque pharetra suscipit arcu, curabitur vitae tellus nibh, ac tempor velit iaculis.[/one_half] [space] [one_third]

Styled image

[caption id="" align="alignleft" width="272"] Le Caption![/caption] [/one_third] [one_third]

Tooltips

Be a lamb and hover this link to show the tooltip! Quisque pharetra suscipit arcu, ac tempor velit iaculis.[/one_third] [one_third]

Simple button

Integer et velit eu dolor ornare vene, etiam molestie turpis id magnama. [button link="#" align="right"]Button[/button][/one_third]

item.title: Sample contact form
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Name: *
[text* your-name]

Email: *
[email* your-email]

Subject:
[text your-subject]

What's on your mind? *
[textarea your-message]

[submit "Submit!"]

[your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> From: [your-name] <[your-email]> Subject: [your-subject] Message Body: [your-message] -- This mail is sent via contact form on Your site name [your-subject] [your-name] <[your-email]> Message body: [your-message] -- This mail is sent via contact form on Pen and Paper WP http://localhost/penandpaper [your-email] Your message was sent successfully. Thanks. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again. Failed to send your message. Please try later or contact the administrator by another method. Please accept the terms to proceed. Email address seems invalid. Please fill the required field. Your entered code is incorrect. Failed to upload file. This file type is not allowed. This file is too large. Failed to upload file. Error occurred. Your answer is not correct. Date format seems invalid. This date is too early. This date is too late. Number format seems invalid. This number is too small. This number is too large. URL seems invalid. Telephone number seems invalid.
